# pd-panel-header

## Events

| Event      | Description                   | Type                   |
| ---------- | ----------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `pd-hover` | Used for panel hover stylings | `CustomEvent<boolean>` |


## Slots

| Slot         | Description                     |
| ------------ | ------------------------------- |
|              | Header content                  |
| `"icons"`    | Additional icons left of carret |
| `"subtitle"` | panel header subtitle content   |
